text: Anationalism is a political ideology originally made by Eugene Lanti and expanded on by others. Anationalists believe in some or all of the following a) Extreme anti-nationalism, b) Universalism, c) Globalism, d) The need for the education and organisation of the proletariat, e) The idea that over time people have become connected language wise, f) There is benefit in using Esperanto. Category:Political ideologies
title: Anationalism
